title: Web Development Practical Competency Strengthening: Simulation-Based Medical Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and patient counseling experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify core communication skills by analyzing three or more patient interaction scenarios via web-based observational practice.
Through collaborative learning activities, learners can develop strategies for responding to complex medical situations by exchanging feedback with peers at least 80% of the time.
After one week of preparatory learning, learners can improve time efficiency (TTC) by 20% in simulation assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
